name: Festive Feast
description: Our take on a feast made healthier and more cost effective at home.

ingredients.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix

preparation: Place mix in resealable plastic bag. Add chicken, shaking gently until evenly coated.
Place chicken on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Cook 20–25 minutes. Food safe thermometer should register at 180 °F (82 °C).
Meanwhile, keep all prepared recipes warm in steamers.
Serve chicken with stuffing, fries, veggies, and gravy. Enjoy!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with Bliss Balls for dessert.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!

products.name: Vegetable Seasoning
summary: All-in-one herby meal helper. Less measuring & more flavor!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
